snippet: A project to fight blight by covering empty houses with colorful dots and discarded dolls, stuffed animals and other items has been marred by what officials suspect is arson.
abstract: Project by Detroit artist Tyree Guyton to fight blight by covering empty houses with colorful dots and discarded dolls, stuffed animals and other items has been marred by what officials suspect is arson; project has drawn mixed reviews, and many tourists.
lead_paragraph: A project to fight blight by covering empty houses with colorful dots and discarded dolls, stuffed animals and other items has been marred by what officials suspect is arson.

headline.main: Fires in Detroit Destroy an Artist’s Canvas: Vacant Houses
headline.print_headline: Fires in Detroit Destroy an Artist’s Canvas: Vacant Houses
